name: The Path to Memento Mori
description:
Something sinister lies in the grounds at the old Sullivan estate. Returning after the death of his grandfather, Daniel finds himself lost in the hidden catacombs and mazes which surround his childhood home. There is something his dead custodian wants him to find, something from Daniel’s past, something Daniel has repressed, and the only way to discover this secret: solve the mazes, play the old man’s sick games, and unlock what lies at the centre.

In this 4-player horror puzzle game, players must collaborate closely to overcome relentless monsters lurking within the catacombs, while deciphering intricate puzzles that guard the secrets of the Sullivan estate. With a haunting atmosphere, chilling soundtrack, and progressively challenging mazes, "The Path to Memento Mori" delivers a gripping and immersive gaming experience that will test your teamwork, problem-solving, and nerves. Can you and your fellow players uncover the dark truth that lies at the heart of this chilling estate, or will you become trapped forever in the shadows of the past?
